content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you're interested in renting my apartment. What price range are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm looking for the lowest price possible. Can you give me the price of the apartment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Max. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I'm willing to consider a rental price of 700 Euros per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, that is within my budget. I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Great to hear that, Max. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The 700 Euros per month rental price is final. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before we proceed with the lease.
name: Heinrich Heine
